# Electron + Vue 3 + Vite + TailwindCSS + Flowbite Project

## Project Summary

This is an Electron desktop application built with Vue 3, Vite, TailwindCSS, and Flowbite. The project uses modern web technologies to create cross-platform desktop applications.

## Quick Start

```bash
npm run dev    # Start development server
npm run build  # Build for production
```
